channel.title: ethers.js on Web3 Teacher Training Track
channel.description: Recent content in ethers.js on Web3 Teacher Training Track

item.title: 05 - Connecting to Web Apps
item.description: Reference the sample project to see all of this in action. Working with Web3 API’s in-browser Unfortunately, most major web browsers do not yet natively provide support for Web3 API’s, so access to those API’s is usually provided via some sort of browser extension.
